content: yarn where the squares are joined 2ch and then 2tr in same space work 3tr clusters in each space until you reach a point where 2 squares join now work tr2tog in exactly the same way as you did in round 1 across the two squares continue working in this way around the blanket with 3tr in each space remembering to tr2tog at every point where two squares join at the corners work 3tr 2ch 3tr when you have worked all the way around join with a slip_stitch into top of 2ch do not cut yarn round 28 rsd work 1 granny round round 29 rsu work 1 granny round round 30 rsd work 1 granny round round 31 rsu work 1 granny round round 32 rsd join colour b in any space between 3tr 2ch 1tr 1ch in same space 2tr 1ch in each space around at the corners work 2tr 3ch 2tr 1ch when you have worked all the way around ending with a 1ch join with a slip_stitch into top of 2ch and fasten_off cut yarn round 33 rsu work 1 granny round round 34 rsd work 1 granny round round 35 rsu work 1 granny round round 36 rsd work 1 granny round round 37 rsu work 1 granny round slip_stitch to join and fasten_off cut yarn © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 22 mini grannies round 38 rsu before starting to join your grannies check you have the correct number of 3tr clusters there should be 75 x 3tr clusters on each side this round consists of 148 x 2 round granny squares and 4 rectangles this round is worked in the same way as round 12 start joining at one corner any corner of the blanket it doesn t matter and work around in a clockwise direction if you want to follow the colours i used there is a list on the next page join the mini grannies as indicated on the diagram join a rectangle in each shaded area as you did in round 12 38-56 57 58-75 96-113 95 76-94 251-431 331 231-411 grace 1-18 19 20-37 start with number 1 here © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 23 grace i used the following colours for each square first letter is centre second is outer round 1 c b 39 d b 77 d b 115 c b 2 d b 40 c b 78 b e 116 e b 3 a b 41 e b 79 a b 117 d b 4 c e 42 d e 80 c b 118 a e 5 d b 43 c b 81 e b 119 c b 6 c b 44 d b 82 d b 120 a b 7 e b 45 a e 83 b e 121 c b 8 d
